items.content_html: `js-libp2p-http` is a lightweight HTTP-like transport built on top of [libp2p](https://github.com/libp2p/js-libp2p). It allows you to send HTTP-like requests over libp2p, with easy handler registration and response handling.

items.content_html: Node. js is an open source cross-platform runtime environment written in JavaScript. It is built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine, which parses and executes the JavaScript code. Node uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model, which makes it fast and lightweight.
items.title: PrajayGoyani/nodejs-learning: Node. js is an open source cross-platform runtime environment written in JavaScript. It is built on Chrome's V8 JavaScript engine, which parses and executes the JavaScript code. Node uses an event-driven, non-blocking I/O model, which makes it fast and lightweight.
